required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study on Visual Performance of a Monofocal Intraocular Lens
clinical_study.official_title: Multicentric Retrospective/Prospective Study on Visual Performance of a Monofocal Intraocular Lens (IOL)

brief_summary.textblock: Retrospective/Prospective Study on Visual Performance of a Monofocal Intraocular Lens (IOL). The objective is to compare best corrected distance visual acuity (CDVA) between 1-3-month and 12- month follow-up.

primary_outcome.description: Comparison between 1-3-month and 12- month follow-up results.

arm_group.description: Patients already implanted with a monofocal IOL

intervention.description: Patients are already implanted with a monofocal lens

study_pop.textblock: Cataract patients already implanted with a monofocal IOL
